dmca.title: Google DMCA - Scranton Dodge
dmca.body:
Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Adwords DMCA Counter Notification
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

I am filing an infringement notice against Ertley Dealerships of Moosic, PA. for falsely advertising my Pennsylvania licensed name Marwen Inc. DBA Scranton Dodge & Scranton Dodge Chrysler Jeep.

I believe this matter is clearly defined under the Uniform Decetive Trade Practices Act, specifically; Section 1 paragraph 8 "Trade Name" and Section 2 paragraph A-1 and A-2 "Deceptive Trade Practices".

Ertley Dealerships is presenting an advertisement through Google adwords whose sole purpose is to confuse shoppers searching for Scranton Dodge.

Section 1
My PA state licensed name is Marwen Inc, DBA Scranton Dodge, and DBA Scranton Dodge Chrysler Jeep.

Section 2
The keyword search done in Google was: Scranton Dodge
The returned search result were:
Scranton Dodge
www.Scranton-Dodge.com
Big discounts on Dodges Largest Dodge Dealer in NEPA

The url sent the user to a page copied directly from Scranton Dodge's web site (my registered domain name is www.scrantondodge.com), but with Ertley's dealership address & phone numbers. The active links on the false page ; www.Scranton-Dodge.com; eventually send the user to www.Ertley.com.

The Uniform Deceptive Trade Practices Act defines this practice as "passing off' and is prohibited.

Section 3
My email address is mtpompey@epix.net or you may fax my office at 570-207-9701.

Section 4
The offending business email contact is info@ertley.com.

Section 5
I have a good faith belief that use of copyrighted materials as described above is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agents or the law.

Section 6
I swear under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed."

Matthew T Pompey
President
Scranton Dodge/
Scranton Dodge Chrysler Jeep/
Tunkhannock Auto Mart
